| Q             | A
| ------------- | ---
| Branch?       | master for features / x.y for bug fixes
| Bug fix?      | yes/no
| New feature?  | yes <!-- update CHANGELOG.md files -->
| New feature?  | no <!-- do nothing -->
| BC breaks?    | yes
| BC breaks?    | no <!-- do nothing -->
| Deprecations? | yes <!-- update UPGRADE-*.md files -->
| Deprecations? | no <!-- do nothing -->
